text: A Daughter of Dixie is a 1910 American silent drama movie directed by Sidney Olcott.A DAUGHTER OF DIXIE and stars Gene Gauntier. ==Actors== * Gene Gauntier - Miss Betsy ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1910 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Olcott
title: A Daughter of Dixie
